Offer available only to students at an accredited higher education institution. Offer not available to users who already tried Premium. Spotify Student Discount Offer Terms and Conditions apply.

Questions?

We've got answer

Am I eligible for this plan?

If you are a student enrolled at an accredited college or university, and above the age of 18, then yes. You can get Premium Student for up to 4 years.

How do you verify that I’m a student?

We verify your enrollment status through a third-party service called SheerID. Learn more.

What happens to my account when I graduate or leave school?

You’ll continue to get access to Premium Student, for up to 12 months from the date you subscribed or last re-verified, while it’s available. If you’re no longer a student at the end of that period, you’ll no longer be eligible for Premium Student. Your subscription will then automatically switch to a Premium Individual plan at ₱149/month.

What will I be charged and when?

You will be charged ₱75/month. If the price changes in the future, we’ll notify you first. You can cancel anytime on your Spotify Account page.
